Purpose : To compare femoral tunnel placement , tunnel geometry clinical outcome use two anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction technique ; transportal technique flexible reamer single bundle outside technique remnant preservation . 2 . Subjects : anterior cruciate ligament ( ACL ) injury 66 patient - Double bundle transportal technique flexible reamer : 33 - Single bundle outside technique remnant preservation : 33
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Femoral Tunnel Clinical Outcome Using Two Anterior Cruciate Ligament Reconstruction Techniques
DOC.detailed_description: Anterior cruciate ligament ( ACL ) injury patient : Total 66 1 . Double bundle transportal technique flexible reamer : 33 - Advantage : normal ACL reconstruction single bundle technique - Disadvantage : make two bone tunnel must remove residual tissue . 2 . Single bundle outside technique remnant preservation : 33 - Advantage : good synovium revascularization . Remained proprioception function help functional recovery . - Disadvantage : difficult ensure visibility tunnel drill correct position remnant tissue .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Lachman test grade II , III Pivot shift test grade II , III physical examination 2 . ACL rupture MRI 3 . Age 20~60 4. within 6 month trauma 1. osteoarthritis ( OA ) change Xray 2 . History ligament injury ACL reconstruction uninjured knee . 3. operation history either ipsilateral contralateral knee ( fracture , etc )
